short_description: Static lookup for league (Beer League, Rec League, Tournament).
Season metadata (start/end dates, division, skill tier).
Game details (date, teams, rink, score, tracking coverage flags).
Team attributes (name, league, colors, home rink, ratings).
Player attributes (name/number, handedness, position, skill rating 2–6, NHL comps).
Calendar date dimension (joins games to week/month/season).
Positions and groups (F, D, G, C, W, LD, RD, etc.).
Offensive/defensive/neutral zone definitions and coordinates.

grain: One row per goaltender box region
short_description: Shot-location boxes on net (high glove, low blocker, five-hole, etc.).

grain: One row per event type + detail
short_description: Canonical catalog of events (shots, passes, turnovers, entries, exits, faceoffs, etc.).
Strength states like 5v5, 5v4, 4v5, 6v5 EN, etc.
Situations like EV, PP, PK, pulled goalie, penalty shot, etc.

grain: One row per skill rating band
short_description: Buckets players into rating tiers (2–6) for context and matchup analysis.
Types of chains: rush, cycle, counter-rush, OZ play, DZ breakout, etc.

grain: One row per player per game
short_description: Official roster per game (eligibility, with/without-you baselines).
Fully normalized event record (players, team, zone, chain IDs, ratings, xy references).

grain: One row per logical player shift
short_description: Per-player shifts with TOI, stoppage-adjusted TOI, goal states, zone start/end, ratings on ice.

grain: One row per player per game
short_description: Aggregated stats per player per game: goals, assists, xG, CF/Fenwick, microstats, ratings context.

grain: One row per game per team
short_description: Team-level game summary including score, xG, CF%, shot maps, special teams results.

grain: One row per forward/defense combo per game
short_description: Line/defense pair results: TOI together, xG for/against, CF%, goals, microstats as a unit.

grain: One row per player-vs-player matchup in a game
short_description: Head-to-head matchups: TOI, xG, CF, goals when players share the ice.
Multi-zone, multi-possession sequences (entries/exits/turnovers leading into shots).
Single-possession plays: OZ cycles, rushes, controlled entries leading to shots/goals.
Micro chains like shot–save–rebound–goal or pass–interception events.
XY coordinates for non-shot events, zoned + enriched with rink dimensions.
Net-relative XY locations for shots/goals, joined to box/segment dims for shot maps.

grain: One row per puck XY sample
short_description: Frames/points tracking puck location for trajectory and speed analysis.

grain: One row per game per tracked module
short_description: Which parts of each game are tracked (shifts, events, XY, shots, video) and over what time ranges.

grain: One row per data quality issue
short_description: Logged anomalies: weird durations, missing IDs, broken joins, suspicious strings like #N/A.
